name: swagger-diff
description: A build/release task for comparing two Swagger Contracts.
author: knom

inputs.name: srcType
inputs.label: Source Document Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Is the source document a file path or Url?

inputs.name: srcFilePath
inputs.label: Source Document File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the source Swagger document.

inputs.name: srcUrl
inputs.label: Source Document Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the source Swagger document.

inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Target Document Type:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Is the target document a file path or Url?

inputs.name: targetFilePath
inputs.label: Target Document File Path:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the target Swagger document.

inputs.name: targetUrl
inputs.label: Target Document Url:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the target Swagger document.
